translation.en: [guy] Guys, get off me!
Get off me!
Hey, get off me!
[man] Jesus said, "You have to put me before other people,
translation.zh:
‎耶稣说过：
‎“你们应当把我放在众人之上

translation.en: and you have to put me before yourself."
Hitler-- That was a demand, to be in the Nazi party.
translation.zh: ‎说到希特勒 加入纳粹党有个条件

translation.en: They had to put the Nazi party and its objectives
translation.zh: ‎你必须把纳粹党和党的宗旨

translation.en: ahead of their father, mother, brother, sister, and their own life.
translation.zh:
‎置于父母、兄弟姐妹
‎甚至是自己的性命之上

translation.en: That was a covenant. A pledge.
translation.zh: ‎那是个誓约 也是个承诺

translation.en: But the real work is invisible.
translation.zh: ‎但真正的力量是肉眼看不见的

translation.en: And it is invisibly spreading.
The more you can make your organization invisible, the more influence it'll have.
translation.zh: ‎组织越难被人察觉 影响力就越大

translation.en: [man 2] They will accuse me of betraying their trust.
In a fundamental way, I did.
translation.zh: ‎但严格来说 我的确背叛了他们

translation.en: They want to be a secret, invisible organization. I wrote two books about them.
translation.zh:
‎他们希望保持神秘、不为人所察觉
‎我却写了两本有关他们的书

translation.en: But the story is no longer just about my experience.
translation.zh:
‎后来这件事出现了
‎超乎我个人经历以外的发展

translation.en: [man 3] It took a long time before I realized just who the Family was,
translation.zh:
‎我花了很长一段时日
‎才意识到团契会的实际意义

translation.en: and the influence they have had in the leadership of our country.
translation.zh:
‎并了解到这个组织
‎如何影响着国家领导

translation.en: This was a group with tentacles around the world,
translation.zh: ‎这个组织的触角遍及全世界

translation.en: meeting with presidents, foreign leaders,
translation.zh: ‎他们与各国总统、国外领导接触

translation.en: to spread their view of Jesus throughout the world.
translation.zh:
‎将他们理解的
‎耶稣的教义散播到世界各地

translation.en: [newscaster] The National Prayer Breakfast:
translation.zh:
‎全国早餐祷告会
‎美国总统艾森豪威尔时开始

translation.en: a Washington institution for Republican and Democratic presidents
translation.zh:
‎全国早餐祷告会
‎美国总统艾森豪威尔时开始 ‎在华府发起的为无论共和党籍或
‎民主党籍的总统祷告的组织

translation.en: since Eisenhower.
translation.zh:
‎在华府发起的为无论共和党籍或
‎民主党籍的总统祷告的组织

translation.en: [Reagan] I want to thank all those inside and outside of Congress
translation.zh: ‎我要感谢所有国会内外的朝野人士

translation.en: who made this all possible.
[woman] They said he's the most powerful man in Washington you've never heard of.
translation.zh:
‎据说该组织主席在华府地位超然
‎但从未有人听说过

translation.en: He's like the Wizard of Oz.
translation.zh: ‎就如童话中“奥兹国的魔法师”

translation.en: [Reagan] I wish I could say more about it,
but it's working precisely because it is private.
translation.zh: ‎只是这个秘密组织行动隐秘

translation.en: [man] We need to reach leaders. And then if you reach the leaders,
translation.zh:
‎我们需要向更多国家领导传教
‎当国家领导得救后

translation.en: then the whole nation will be influenced for Christ.
The notion was floated: What if we lived together?
translation.zh:
‎我们常听人问：
‎“同一个屋檐下是什么情况？”

translation.en: I was part of a group called C Street when I was in Washington.
translation.zh:
‎我在华府期间
‎曾加入一个叫“C街”的组织

translation.en: [reporter] Governor Mark Sanford, Senator John Ensign,
translation.zh: ‎马克桑福德州长、参议员约翰恩赛

translation.en: all embroiled in scandal...
Doing the Lord's work in the devil's playground.
translation.zh:
‎这个组织在魔鬼的游乐场中
‎执行神的事工

translation.en: [man] We meet with some really horrible people.
translation.zh: ‎我们经常与非常可恶的人打交道

translation.en: Dictators and murderers and thieves.
translation.zh: ‎他们是独裁者、杀人凶手和盗贼

translation.en: If I were a bad faith actor from another country,
translation.zh:
‎如果我是个来自外国的
‎假装虔诚信徒的坏人

translation.en: that is exactly the kind of meeting that I would want to exploit.
translation.zh: ‎我一定会利用这种组织来达到目的

translation.en: [man] Everybody in the room had their hands on this President-elect.
translation.zh: ‎大家把手按在新任总统肩上

translation.en: [man 2] This is what the Family's been waiting for.
translation.zh: ‎这是团契会期待已久的一刻

translation.en: He's God's man.
[woman] And they say it's about faith,
but there's a shared understanding
that what we're really about here is power.
[man] I lived with those guys,
prayed with them at their headquarters at the seat of their power.
translation.zh:
‎跟他们一起坐在他们总部
‎他们权位显赫的地方祷告

translation.en: There were congressmen, senators, world leaders.
translation.zh:
‎当中包括国会议员
‎参议员和世界级领袖

translation.en: An invisible organization that had been hiding in plain sight for over 80 years.
translation.zh:
‎这是一个躲在众人眼目下
‎拥有超过80年历史的秘密组织

translation.en: [man 2] People think that there's something sinister.
translation.zh: ‎人们认为组织成员拥有邪恶的议程

translation.en: There has to be a conspiracy.
It's the furthest thing from the truth.
[woman] It's a breathtaking enmeshment of Church and State.
translation.zh: ‎这是个令人震撼不已的政教组织

translation.en: [man] A humble example of leadership that the world has never seen.
translation.zh:
‎这种谦卑温和的领导典范
‎是世人前所未见的

translation.en: -[man 2] That's a corruption of democracy. -[man 3] It's the power of God.
translation.zh: ‎这是民主败坏的象征 ‎这是神的力量

translation.en: [man 4] This is something that the world desperately needs.
translation.zh: ‎这是当前世界极度需要的一股力量

translation.en: [man 1] Hark! All worry will be left behind.
translation.zh: ‎NETFLIX 原创纪录片系列 ‎听啊 所有烦恼都会成为过去

translation.en: All disappointment, too, will be gone forever.
[man 2] We adopted a program for a worldwide spiritual offensive.
translation.zh: ‎我们致力于打造全球性属灵武器

translation.en: [man 3] I know, as never before.
translation.zh: ‎我从未像这一刻般清楚地意识到

translation.en: that we are all God's children.
[man 1] There is only one thing we can take with us through that door.
translation.zh: ‎我们只能带着一样东西踏入天堂大门

translation.en: Those whom we have led to the Savior.
translation.zh: ‎就是那些在我们的领导下得救的人

translation.en: [man] Fear him. Love him.
Submit yourself completely.
Then you will be His disciple.
[George W. Bush] What we have begun, we will finish.
[man] One of the things I've always found interesting, even as a boy,
translation.zh: ‎有一件事 我从小就深感兴趣

translation.en: is the idea that there are these battles between good and evil;
translation.zh: ‎我对善良与邪恶之间的斗争感到着迷

translation.en: that we are actively engaged in a war with the forces of evil every day,
translation.zh: ‎以致我们天天都在与恶魔搏斗

translation.en: and that there are demonic influences in our lives,
translation.zh:
‎也深信生活中到处
‎都存在着邪恶的势力

translation.en: and that you have to be on guard.
So as a boy, this, on the one hand, makes the world a much scarier place.
translation.zh:
‎所以我从小就觉得
‎这个世界是倾向邪恶的 ‎（《团契会》作者 杰夫沙莱特）

translation.en: On the other hand, it makes the world a more exciting place.
translation.zh:
‎但往另一个角度想
‎世界也因此变得有趣起来

translation.en: My mother died of breast cancer.
Um... She was young, and I was just a kid.
translation.zh: ‎她死的时候 我还是个孩子

translation.en: She grew up in vaguely Pentecostal Christianity.
translation.zh:
‎我母亲是个
‎信仰根基模糊的五旬派基督徒

translation.en: And as she lay dying,
she would invite members of various faiths in to pray with her.
translation.zh:
‎她会邀请不同信仰的教徒
‎前来为她祷告

translation.en: And I noticed some of them prayed for her salvation,
translation.zh:
‎我发现有几个教友祷告
‎希望我母亲能得着救恩

translation.en: that she would become a member of their faith, even in death.
translation.zh: ‎希望她死后也能成为一个真正的信徒

translation.en: And some of them prayed for her deliverance,
translation.zh: ‎有些人则祷告她能得着拯救

translation.en: for a reprieve from her suffering, so that she might live longer.
translation.zh:
‎希望神医治她的病痛
‎让她得以活得更长久

translation.en: And that question of deliverance versus salvation,
the world to come or freedom now,
really struck me,
and has lead me into all the stories that I've been interested in ever since.
translation.zh:
‎有鉴于此
‎我开始钻研我感兴趣的宗教课题

translation.en: When I was in my early 20s, I decided to write about religion.
translation.zh:
‎二十岁出头时
‎我开始写有关宗教的文章

translation.en: And I was living in New York, working on this book,
and I'd heard that an old friend of mine, a man named Luke, was in town.
translation.zh:
‎我听说有个叫卢克老朋友
‎刚好也待在纽约

translation.en: Luke was a very promising guy,
translation.zh: ‎卢克是个前途无量的年轻人

translation.en: from a sort of an upper-class family, and had a fine trajectory to his life.
translation.zh: ‎出生于上流社会 未来一片光明

translation.en: Engaged to be married, and building a financial career.
translation.zh:
‎他订婚了 有个稳定交往的对象
‎正在为金融事业打拼

translation.en: But then he left all that
and moved across the country to join, um, what his family feared was a cult.
translation.zh:
‎搬去一个遥远的地方
‎家人担心他加入了邪教

translation.en: He seemed to just drop out, just to disappear.
And so his family said, because they knew I wrote about religion,
translation.zh: ‎他家人知道我写过与宗教有关的文章

translation.en: they said, "Would you meet with him and sort of see what he's up to?"
translation.zh:
‎于是问我：“你能不能去见见他？
‎弄清楚他在搞什么？”

translation.en: This was very shortly after 9/11.
And one of the things he said he was there for--
translation.zh: ‎他告诉我说 他也在现场

translation.en: He wanted to survey the ruins of secularism.
translation.zh: ‎他在研究政教分离带来的不良后果

translation.en: But he said, "Now we see clearly. This is a battle between good and evil."
translation.zh: ‎他说：“如今显而易见的是 ‎这是一场善良与邪恶之间的战争”

translation.en: He seems to be a transformed person.
And he told me about this amorphous thing that he had joined.
translation.zh:
‎他跟我说
‎他加入了一个无形无相的组织

translation.en: -He says... [voices overlap] -"They're not Christians."
We're followers of Jesus, and we just serve.
translation.zh:
‎我们只是耶稣的门徒
‎为的是要侍奉他人

translation.en: Who do you serve?
Men who are chosen by God for leadership.
Politicians.
-Is there an organization? -No.
No church, no ministers, no rules and rituals.
translation.zh:
‎没有教堂、没有牧师
‎没有教条、没有仪式

translation.en: You read the Bible, though, right?
Sure, sure, but mostly, we work.
translation.zh: ‎当然有啊 只是大部分时间都在工作

translation.en: We...
rake leaves, play basketball, clean toilets.
Wait, you clean toilets... for politicians?
[laughs] I know it sounds weird...
-Yeah. -...but it's not.
It's just a bunch of guys living together.
translation.zh: ‎我们只是一群住在一起的人

translation.en: It's great.
[Jeff Sharlet] It seemed so simple.
And then he invited me to come see it for myself.
translation.zh: ‎后来他邀请我去亲眼见识一下

translation.en: And knowing almost nothing of it, I did.
translation.zh:
‎对整个情况毫无头绪的我
‎毅然答应了

translation.en: [man] Do you take drugs, alcohol, or prescription medication?
translation.zh:
‎你有没有长期服用
‎毒品、酒精或处方药？

translation.en: [Sharlet] You only got in by being recommended.
translation.zh: ‎唯有通过第三者引荐才能踏进会所

translation.en: And had to go through a little interview at this office on Capitol Hill,
translation.zh:
‎我必须到该组织
‎位于国会山的办公室面试

translation.en: with a senior aide to a Republican senator from Oklahoma at the time.
translation.zh:
‎面试官是某个俄克拉何马州
‎共和党参议员的高级助理

translation.en: [aide] And do you have a girlfriend?
[Sharlet] He asked me about my relationship with my girlfriend...
translation.zh: ‎他也询问我和女朋友的相处情况

translation.en: -[aide] Is she Christian? -Yeah.
[Sharlet] ...and about my parents.
Questions that I would later come to understand
translation.zh: ‎后来我才发现他之所以问这些问题

translation.en: were sort of testing how much was I willing to renounce.
translation.zh: ‎是想知道我到底愿意放弃多少个关系

translation.en: -And I answered them very honestly. -[inaudible]
Because you have to understand,
I was in no way an investigative journalist at this time.
translation.zh: ‎我当时并不是个调查性报道记者

translation.en: -[aide] Were you close with your mom? -I was, yeah.
[Sharlet] There was no stealth, no cleverness.
I told them I was a writer,
and I'd been traveling around the country,
trying to understand all the different ideas of Jesus,
translation.zh:
‎竭尽所能想要了解
‎人们对耶稣的不同诠释

translation.en: and I was interested in getting to know theirs.
translation.zh: ‎因此也很想了解他们耶稣的理解

translation.en: [aide] Rent is $400.
That's with room and board.
[Sharlet] I think it was about a week later.
I passed the test. I was welcome to come and just live with them
translation.zh:
‎我通过了他们提供的考试 ‎他们欢迎我加入组织
‎一起生活在同一个屋檐下

translation.en: and be a brother, as they put it.
A group of the brothers had come to pick me up,
and they drove me across the river to Arlington, Virginia,
translation.zh:
‎载着我渡河前往弗吉尼亚州
‎一个叫阿灵顿的小镇

translation.en: a suburb of Washington
translation.zh: ‎这个小镇位于华盛顿特区的市郊地区

translation.en: where a lot of intelligence community folks live.
translation.zh: ‎许多情报人员都聚集在这里

translation.en: And we went down into this cul-de-sac
and past this big, beautiful Georgian mansion.
translation.zh: ‎经过一幢乔治亚风格的漂亮豪宅

translation.en: -Nice house, huh? -Yeah.
Wow.
Look, I didn't know how to explain you to the guys,
translation.zh: ‎我不知道该怎么介绍你给他们认识

translation.en: so I just said that we're getting a new dude. He's from New York.
translation.zh: ‎我就说你是来自纽约的新人

translation.en: -He's a writer. He's Jewish. -Half-Jewish, actually.
translation.zh:
‎-他是个作家 也是个犹太人
‎-其实是半个犹太人

translation.en: And he wants to know Jesus.
Know what they said? No.
translation.zh:
‎-你知道他们会怎么说吗？
‎-不知道

translation.en: "Bring him on."
Let's go.
♪ Everything to God in prayer ♪
♪ Are there trials and temptations? ♪
[Sharlet] So, I move to this house called Ivanwald.
Guys? This is, uh, Jeff.
[Sharlet] It was buzzing with all these guys. Sort of a frat house kind of feel.
translation.zh:
‎屋里有一帮男人 非常热闹
‎有点像大学时期的兄弟会所

translation.en: But no beer, no--
Nothing else, you know, very-- A pious frat house for God.
translation.zh:
‎什么都没有
‎宛如为神而设的男生宿舍

translation.en: ♪ The Lord in prayer... ♪
[Sharlet] And pretty quickly,
I realized this is not what I thought it was going to be.
translation.zh: ‎我就发现这个地方跟我想象中不同

translation.en: -Jeff. -Hey, Jeff, welcome to Ivanwald.
translation.zh:
‎-我叫杰夫
‎-欢迎来到伊凡瓦德之家

translation.en: -Thanks for having me. -Yeah.
I think you're gonna enjoy staying here.
-Let's get you settled in. -Yeah.
[man] If you hang out in certain sectors around Washington, you've heard about it.
translation.zh:
‎在华盛顿某些地区逗留的人
‎都略有所闻

translation.en: There was a guy's house and a girl's house down the street,
translation.zh:
‎他们知道附近
‎有个男生宿舍和女生宿舍

translation.en: and it was this little enclave,
translation.zh: ‎那是个与现实社会隔绝的境地

translation.en: sort of a sabbatical from regular life.
translation.zh:
‎住在里面的人
‎过着远离世俗的安乐生活

translation.en: [Sims] There were guys from all over the world,
all walks of life.
Religious, non-religious,
translation.zh: ‎有些是虔诚信徒 有些是无神论者

translation.en: questioning, skeptical.
translation.zh: ‎他们拥有许多疑问 充满疑惑

translation.en: It was raw. It was real.
Little more like the 12 guys you read about in this-- this book, right?
translation.zh:
‎就像你们从这本书里
‎读到的那12个人 不是吗？

translation.en: And as a young Christian working in politics,
translation.zh: ‎作为一个涉足政坛的青年基督徒

translation.en: it was exactly what I needed.
Yeah.
[Sharlet] The regiment at Ivanwald was so precise it was relaxing.
translation.zh:
‎在伊凡瓦德之家
‎我们循规蹈矩 生活轻松

translation.en: No swearing, no drinking.
No sex, no self.
You don't waste time on newspapers. Never watch TV.
translation.zh: ‎我们不花时间看报纸 也不曾看电视

translation.en: [brother] ...steadfastly into heaven.
[Sharlet] You eat meat. You study the gospels.
You play basketball.
-Yeah, here we go. -I got outside.
[Sharlet] God loves a man who can sink a three-pointer.
[brother] Hey, Jeff.
Will you lead us in prayer?
[Jeff] Sure.
[sighs] Lord, uh, Lord God,
uh, Heavenly Father.
Jesus, thank you so much for...
the guys here, and...
um, the chance to play basketball, and to...
to learn teamwork, and, um...
And learn how to fight for you.
We pray all this in Jesus' name. Amen.
translation.zh: ‎如此祷告是奉耶稣之名 ‎阿门

translation.en: -Amen. -Amen.
[Sharlet] The kind of storytelling that I've always found interesting
translation.zh: ‎把自己完全沉浸在他人的生活中

translation.en: is submerging of yourself in the lives of others.
Crossing into that world of belief until you're a little bit lost.
translation.zh:
‎跨入一个信仰的世界
‎以致自己也有点迷失了

translation.en: It's spiritually dangerous,
in the sense that you could be converted.
And at Ivanwald, it meant seeing what happens if, for a time at least,
translation.zh:
‎在伊凡瓦德之家
‎意味着亲身经历这一切 有一段时日

translation.en: I accepted their ideas.
"Where shall I flee from your presence?
If I ascend into heaven, you are there.
translation.zh: ‎我若升到天堂 祢在那里

translation.en: If I make my bed in the depths, you are there."
translation.zh: ‎我若在阴间下榻 祢也在那里

translation.en: [brother] It's intense, right?
It's like, you can't run.
Doesn't matter where you turn,
'cause Jesus is going to be right there, waiting for you.
Jesus is smart.
He's going to get you.
Let's pray.
[Luke] "I call out to the Lord.
I pray to him for his favor."
"I praise you for I am fearful..."
[Sharlet] We would pray to be broken.
We would pray to be nothing.
We would pray to learn how to obey.
translation.zh: ‎我们祷告能学会怎么顺服神

translation.en: [brother] In here, we're safe with our brothers, learning the ways of Jesus.
translation.zh:
‎在这里 我们可以安心地
‎与弟兄们共同学习活像耶稣

translation.en: [Sharlet] They said this is our prime relationship with this Jesus.
translation.zh:
‎他们说我们要把与耶稣的关系
‎置于所有关系之上

translation.en: -[brother] Does that make sense to you? -Yeah.
And so we would pray to crush what we would call our inner rebel.
translation.zh: ‎我们祷告能粉碎心中的叛逆

translation.en: -Jeff? -Hey.
-I see you're writing a lot down. -Yeah.
But are you listening?
I know it's a lot to take in,
translation.zh: ‎我知道你有很多东西要学习

translation.en: but this is all you really need.
It's the Bible. It's the part that matters.
translation.zh: ‎这是圣经 里面都是重点

translation.en: It's just Jesus.
[Sharlet] One of the things that surprised me was that
though most of these men were very scripturally literate,
translation.zh: ‎虽然这些人大部分都很熟悉圣经

translation.en: they didn't care very much about the Bible.
There was a small book that you're given.
This little book that says "Jesus."
That's it. Just Jesus, nothing else.
translation.zh:
‎单单写着“耶稣”两个字
‎除此之外 什么都没有

translation.en: And it was four gospels: Matthew, Mark, Luke, and John,
translation.zh:
‎里面只有四个福音书
‎也就是马太、马可、路加和约翰

translation.en: with the Book of Acts referred to here as Acts of Ambassadors.
translation.zh:
‎还有使徒行传
‎在书里被称为《使节行传》

translation.en: And they didn't need to read too much further than that.
translation.zh:
‎他们只研读这几个福音书
‎其他经卷都被排除在外

translation.en: There's not a whole lot of theology.
There's no wrestling with God, with conscience,
translation.zh: ‎没提到与神摔跤、良心的挣扎

translation.en: traditional concerns of fundamentalism. They don't talk about the devil.
translation.zh: ‎也不关心原教旨主义 ‎他们不谈论魔鬼

translation.en: Just Jesus. Just Jesus. That's all.
Now, which part of Jesus was Psalm 137?
translation.zh: ‎诗篇第137章有哪个部分提到耶稣？

translation.en: "O daughter of Babylon who are to be destroyed,
happy shall he be that taketh the little ones
translation.zh:
‎报复你像你待我们的
‎那人便为有福

translation.en: and dasheth them against the stones."
translation.zh:
‎拿你的婴孩摔在磐石上的
‎那人便为有福”

translation.en: Which part of Jesus would be in that?
translation.zh: ‎这段经节里 有哪个部分提到耶稣？

translation.en: Jeff, brother, I don't know,
translation.zh: ‎杰夫弟兄 我不知道该怎么说

translation.en: but I'm pretty sure he'll let you know when it's time.
translation.zh:
‎不过我相信时候到了
‎祂就会让你知道

translation.en: [Sharlet] They said Christianity's been misunderstood.
That all the rubes out there, the suckers,
they think that Christ came to preach equally to everybody. Not so.
translation.zh:
‎都以为耶稣来到世上
‎是为所有人传福音 事实并非如此

translation.en: They said he had rings of power. Closest are James and Peter.
translation.zh:
‎他们说耶稣有自己的内部圈子
‎最亲近祂的人是雅各和彼得

translation.en: Then you go out another circle, and there's the disciples.
translation.zh:
‎圈子以外还有另一个圈子
‎里面是其他使徒

translation.en: And out here...
is everybody else, and they'll get the message,
translation.zh:
‎就是其他人
‎他们都会收到耶稣的信息

translation.en: but they won't get it in unvarnished form.
translation.zh: ‎但他们得到的不是最原始的版本

translation.en: They can't handle the truth.
Let us be nothing.
[Sharlet] But now we've moved from this outer ring to one of those very near inner circles.
translation.zh:
‎我们这群人开始从外部圈子
‎移向内部圈子

translation.en: -And we are the new chosen. -[brother] Please, Jesus...
-[Sharlet] The ones that matter. -...work through us.
[Sharlet] As a brother in Ivanwald, as one among these new chosen,
translation.zh:
‎作为伊凡瓦德之家的弟兄
‎也是刚被神选的门徒

translation.en: some of us were assigned to work in their headquarters called the Cedars.
translation.zh:
‎我们被差遣到
‎名为“雪松馆”的总部侍奉

translation.en: We would rake leaves. We'd clean toilets.
translation.zh: ‎我们负责清扫树叶、清洗厕所

translation.en: I thought this was so absurd, this religious movement of humbling yourself
translation.zh:
‎我对这种通过为政商人士清洗厕所
‎从而学习放下自我的宗教运动

translation.en: by cleaning the toilets of the powerful.
[Luke] Load some of these up.
[Sharlet] The Cedars is this big, white-pillared mansion
translation.zh:
‎雪松馆是一幢豪华大宅
‎门前白色廊柱耸立

translation.en: that looks a little bit like the White House.
And it is very clearly the seat of their power,
translation.zh:
‎（华盛顿哥伦比亚特区 L-9836
‎无代表 不纳税）

translation.en: because it's where they host a lot of foreign leaders.
translation.zh:
‎因为这里就是接待许多
‎外国领袖的地方

translation.en: Wait, I recognize him.
That's that, uh, Republican Senator from Oklahoma.
translation.zh: ‎他是俄克拉何马州的共和党参议员

translation.en: [Luke] Yeah. They all come here.
translation.zh: ‎对啊 这些人都是这里的常客

translation.en: Left, right,
Republican, Democrat.
But those terms don't reflect the movement's vision.
translation.zh:
‎但这些词汇无法反映出
‎这场宗教运动的影响力

translation.en: It's bigger than that.
We had the president of Uganda here the other day.
We prayed for him.
Yeah. The Family has friends all over the world.
[Sharlet] There were African diplomats,
Russian nationals,
congressmen, senators,
and that's when I realized: this is important.
translation.zh: ‎那一刻我才领悟到这是大事

translation.en: This is not just a fascinating story.
These are powerful people.
[woman] Yeah, I'd heard about 'em, but it was more public lore.
translation.zh:
‎我听说过这个组织
‎但也只是道听途说

translation.en: They weren't neighbors that you really got to know very well.
translation.zh: ‎（雪松馆邻居 卡拉温博尔纳维兹）

translation.en: I got to know them because unfortunately one of their limousines ran over my cat.
translation.zh:
‎我是在一个不幸的情况下认识他们
‎因为有一辆豪华汽车撞死了我的猫

translation.en: So there-- there were a couple of incidents like that.
They didn't endear themselves to the neighborhood.
translation.zh: ‎他们不会跟邻居建立友好关系

translation.en: Hey! Carla's here, too.
-I found some correspondence. -Oh, good.
Yes, yes.
Being involved in the neighborhood, I got the impression
translation.zh: ‎住在这个社区里 我发现…

translation.en: that you're either with them, or you're not with them.
translation.zh: ‎…他们把邻居划分成支持者和反对者

translation.en: They had a-- oh, a big map of the neighborhood.
translation.zh: ‎他们有一大张这个社区的地图

translation.en: This is interesting, Carla.
Did you know that they had a 3-by-4-foot map of the neighborhood
translation.zh:
‎你知道他们有一张
‎90乘以120公分的社区地图吗？

translation.en: with each house and a designated color,
translation.zh: ‎地图上每间房子都标上不同的颜色

translation.en: depending upon how supportive they were of the Fellowship?
translation.zh:
‎他们以颜色来显明每户人家
‎对他们的支持度

translation.en: Green, yellow, and red.
Support, indifference, or antagonism.
translation.zh: ‎分别代表支持、无所谓和反对

translation.en: -I forgot that, too. -So it's kind of like a war map.
translation.zh:
‎-我也忘了这点
‎-有点像是用来打仗的地图

translation.en: For a long time, I was the president of the civic association,
translation.zh: ‎我担任街坊守望互助会主席多年

translation.en: which is why I knocked on the door one day
translation.zh: ‎那天我敲了那幢房子的大门

translation.en: and said, "I'd like to find out just what this is all about."
translation.zh:
‎我说：“我想知道
‎这幢房子的来龙去脉”

translation.en: So this very nice man gave me a tour of the big house, the Cedars.
translation.zh:
‎于是有个非常友善的男人
‎带我参观了整个雪松馆

translation.en: And it was very much mid-nineteenth-century.
translation.zh: ‎室内充满了十九世纪中期风情

translation.en: Beautifully restored
in the style of interior decoration you'd have if you want to impress people.
translation.zh: ‎这种室内装潢足以令人大开眼界

translation.en: And then they gave me a tour of the boys' residence hall.
translation.zh: ‎接着他们带我去参观那些男生的宿舍

translation.en: And the boys are outside,
landscaping and cleaning the gutters.
And the kids there said that they would continue to do this
translation.zh:
‎那些孩子告诉我说
‎他们会一直做下去

translation.en: until God spoke to them
and gave them their instructions for the rest of their life.
translation.zh: ‎指示他们如果走人生下一步为止

translation.en: And I said, "I have to say that for a bunch of people in their 20s,
translation.zh:
‎我听了说：“实话实说
‎这些二十多岁年轻人的被动程度

translation.en: these are abnormally passive."
While I was in the boys' dormitory,
one of them said, "You know, we have a Tuesday night prayer meeting.
translation.zh:
‎有个男生跟我说：
‎“星期二晚上有个祷告会

translation.en: Why don't you join us?"
So I went to their Tuesday night prayer meetings,
translation.zh:
‎于是我开始参加
‎每个星期二晚上的祷告会

translation.en: week after week after week.
What they offer their followers is a sense of belonging,
translation.zh: ‎他们为信徒提供了某种归属感

translation.en: a kind of unquestioning...
"We're with you through thick and thin."
translation.zh: ‎“不顾艰难险阻 同甘共苦”

translation.en: And there's something very alluring about that.
I wouldn't mind being accepted by a group of people... unquestioningly. [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎我不介意加入这种群组
‎这点毋庸置疑

translation.en: I only got a little glimpse of their theology,
translation.zh: ‎我对他们秉持的神学理解不多

translation.en: and I really don't know about their form of Christianity,
translation.zh: ‎我真的不知道他们属于那个基督教派

translation.en: or if even they are all Christians.
translation.zh: ‎甚至不清楚他们是不是全都是基督徒

translation.en: But when I learned how they're very unapologetically targeting the rich and powerful,
translation.zh:
‎可是当我发现
‎他们面不改色地招揽权贵后

translation.en: I found that to be disturbing.
But I never asked any impolite questions.
translation.zh: ‎但我不曾问过任何失礼的问题

translation.en: I just sat and listened.
And then the following week, there was no prayer meeting.
translation.zh: ‎后来那个星期的祷告会就取消了

translation.en: And there was no prayer meeting ever again after that.
I think they were trying to shake me off.
[whispering loudly] Okay. I know, I know. Just try to take a deep breath.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 我理解 先深呼吸

translation.en: You're home, right?
I mean, wish I was there with you right now, I really do,
translation.zh:
‎我真希望能陪在你身边
‎这是肺腑之言

translation.en: but there's nothing I can do about it.
Because I can't just walk out of here!
Be calm.
I will-- I'll ask them, okay? And maybe tomorrow, or--
translation.zh: ‎因为…我去问他们 好吗？ ‎或许明天吧 还是…

translation.en: No, no, you can't come here.
-Hey. -[car departs]
How are you?
-Yeah, it's good to hear your voice, too. -[car engine turns over]
Yeah, no, I have a lot to tell you about, so...
Gonna have to confiscate that.
Let me call you back.
All right, bye.
I'm just kidding.
Phone calls are allowed, but they're discouraged for new brothers.
translation.zh:
‎通电话不是违规行为
‎只是不鼓励新来的弟兄讲电话

translation.en: We want your full attention.
translation.zh: ‎希望你能把心力都专注在这里

translation.en: I was just, like, letting Luke have some time with his fiancee.
translation.zh: ‎我只是想让卢克和他未婚妻好好谈谈

translation.en: Luke's fiancee is a Jezebel.
translation.zh: ‎卢克的未婚妻是个放荡的女人

translation.en: She doesn't obey God.
We're accountable to each other, Jeff. That's the brotherhood.
translation.zh: ‎杰夫 我们互相支持 这叫弟兄情谊

translation.en: I'm here to make sure you don't deviate from Christ's will.
translation.zh: ‎我要确保你不会偏离基督的旨意

translation.en: All right?
Okay.
[Sharlet] It's important to remember,
these brothers, they were not bad guys.
translation.zh: ‎这些所谓的弟兄都不是坏人

translation.en: They were there because they wanted meaning in their life.
translation.zh: ‎他们来到那里是为了寻找生命的意义

translation.en: They wanted to feel like they were part of something valuable.
translation.zh: ‎他们希望自己在做某种有价值的事

translation.en: I remember one day, I'd been there for a while,
translation.zh: ‎我在那里待了一段时日后 某一天

translation.en: and one of the brothers, he says, "Guys, I have something for you to do.
translation.zh:
‎有个弟兄提议说：
‎“弟兄们 我突然有个想法

translation.en: Arm wrestle."
[Sharlet] And then someone yells, "Fumble!" and then suddenly,
translation.zh: ‎接着有个人喊道：“掉球” 突然之间

translation.en: they were all piling on me and, you know, hitting.
translation.zh:
‎几个人叠在我身上
‎不断拍打我的身体

translation.en: -[Jeff] Get off me! Get off me! -[brothers laugh]
I said, get off me!
[Sharlet] And at that time, I thought, "This is really strange."
But as it turns out, there was actually a spiritual message to this.
translation.zh:
‎后来我才发现这个举止
‎象征着一个属灵道理

translation.en: The Jesus most of us are familiar with is tender and loving.
translation.zh:
‎在大部分人眼里
‎耶稣是个温柔博爱的人

translation.en: He's the lamb of God.
A figure of peace and gentleness.
But no, their idea of Jesus--
Jesus' love is strong. As they'd said, "Jesus is not a sissy."
translation.zh:
‎耶稣的爱强烈如火
‎他们说：“耶稣不是个弱者”

translation.en: And if Jesus was alive today,
maybe he would be a Navy SEAL.
If Jesus was alive today, he'd be great at football.
translation.zh:
‎如果耶稣还活着
‎祂就是个出色的橄榄球员

translation.en: And so this was spiritual training.
It was a kind of muscular Christianity.
translation.zh: ‎这种基督教义似乎充满了阳刚味

translation.en: And they were, as I came to understand, crushing Christ into me.
translation.zh:
‎后来我才明白 他们压上来
‎是为了把基督的爱灌注在我身上

translation.en: This was the initiation in which all our bodies became one.
translation.zh: ‎这个仪式象征我们身体合一

translation.en: [Jeff] I can't breathe! Guys, I can't breathe.
I can't breathe.
Get off me.
[brother] One falls down, his friend can help him up.
translation.zh: ‎跌掉了 弟兄会扶他起来

translation.en: You're one of us now.
-Come on, circle up. -[brother] Phew!
[Sharlet] The brothers referred to our group as a family.
And they said I'd become a member of the Family.
translation.zh: ‎他们说我已经是这个家的成员了

translation.en: Or the Fellowship, as it's sometimes known.
translation.zh: ‎有时候我们也把这个家称为“团契”

translation.en: But the name is not important.
[Sharlet] And sometimes I would make a mistake and refer to some political figure--
translation.zh:
‎有时候当我误以为
‎某个政治人物是我们的一员时…

translation.en: "Oh, so they're a member? Can we--" "No, they are a friend of the Family."
translation.zh:
‎“他们也是我们的一员吗？那我们…”
‎“不是 他们只是我们家人的朋友”

translation.en: There was all these subtle distinctions.
And that's part of the invisibility of it.
I asked one time about the hierarchy, the organizational structure.
translation.zh:
‎我曾经想了解
‎这个团契的阶级制度和组织结构

translation.en: And they said, "Why do you keep talking about this?
translation.zh: ‎他们说：“为什么执着于这些事？

translation.en: It's just me and you, you and you,
and we are accountable to one another.
And that's just the way God wants it."
It never occurred to me to, you know, sort of asked for an org chart.
translation.zh: ‎我从来不曾向他们要组织结构图

translation.en: Who are the people, how is it organized? What's the structure?
translation.zh:
‎也不想知道是谁掌权
‎组织排列和结构如何

translation.en: And of course, the people who'd been around a long time
translation.zh:
‎那些待在组织里够久的人
‎一听到有人提问

translation.en: were just really quick to say, "Don't call it anything."
translation.zh:
‎自然很快就会反应说：
‎“别为这个组织取名”

translation.en: I'm like, "You gotta call it something."
So yeah, you kinda call it the Fellowship,
translation.zh: ‎于是我们把这个组织称为“团契”

translation.en: or you call it a group of friends following Jesus, whatever it was.
translation.zh:
‎或是一群追随耶稣的同伴
‎叫什么都行

translation.en: But definitions aside,
you know, trying to stick a label on it,
you see what's happening relationally,
and where else is this happening?
translation.zh: ‎只是其他地方找得到这种关系吗？

translation.en: This is something that the world desperately needs.
translation.zh: ‎这是这个世界最需要的力量

translation.en: Well, you're gonna have a shorter nose.
You guys are here to learn how to rule the world.
translation.zh: ‎你们来这里是为了学习统治世界

translation.en: You have very intense eyes.
Thank you.
[older man] Hey, let's talk about the Old Testament.
Who would you say are its good guys?
translation.zh: ‎你们认为旧约圣经里有谁是好人？

translation.en: -Moses? -Noah?
David.
King David, that's a good one.
What would you say made him a good guy?
His faith was so strong.
King David liked to do some really bad things.
translation.zh: ‎可是大卫王尽做些伤天害理的丑事

translation.en: I mean, this is a guy who slept with another man's wife, Bathsheba, right?
translation.zh: ‎这个家伙勾引有夫之妇拔示巴

translation.en: And he basically murders her husband.
And this guy is supposedly one of our heroes?
Jiminy Christmas. God likes this guy.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 神居然悦纳这种人

translation.en: What is that all about?
Is it because he tried?
He wanted to do the right thing.
Anyone else?
'Cause he was chosen.
Yeah. Chosen.
Interesting set of rules, isn't it?
Let's say here one of you here raped three little girls,
translation.zh:
‎假设你们当中
‎有个弟兄强暴了三个少女

translation.en: and now you're sitting here at Ivanwald. What would I think of you?
translation.zh:
‎如今这个人就在伊凡瓦德之家中
‎你们认为我会怎么看待他？

translation.en: That I'm a terrible person?
No, I wouldn't.
That's not why I'm here. It's not my job to judge you.
translation.zh: ‎我来这里的目的不是批判你

translation.en: I'm here for one thing.
What is that?
Jesus?
[Sharlet] That disturbing moment sort of crystallizes it for me.
translation.zh: ‎那震撼性的一刻使我脑洞大开

translation.en: This core idea that some people are more chosen than others.
translation.zh:
‎某些人是被神选的 别人不是
‎是他们核心的观念

translation.en: And if you're chosen,
doesn't matter what you do.
I'd still be with you.
-And then he said... [voices overlap] -We elect our leaders,
translation.zh:
‎-接着他说…
‎-我们选出了我们要的国家领袖

translation.en: Jesus elects his.
And we warn everyone,
the future king is coming.
Not just of this country... but of the world.
translation.zh:
‎他来不仅是为了这个国家
‎也是为了全世界

translation.en: [Sims] The Cedars is a set-apart place.
It's a historic place, it's a beautiful place,
translation.zh: ‎除了是个充满历史性的漂亮豪宅

translation.en: and it is a place that offers hospitality to the world.
[Sims] There was a weekly breakfast that we were responsible for,
translation.zh: ‎每星期我们都会负责一顿早餐

translation.en: I think we called it the ambassador's breakfast.
How many ambassadors were actually present is always, you know--
translation.zh:
‎究竟有多少个外交官会出席
‎向来都是个未知数

translation.en: I think a fairly limited number.
But it was a chance for people
translation.zh:
‎但我们有机会看到
‎那些经常出入公众视线的政商名流

translation.en: who were in and out of various stages of public life
translation.zh:
‎但我们有机会看到
‎那些经常出入公众视线的政商名流 ‎一起坐下来祷告、吃早餐

translation.en: to have breakfast together in prayer.
-Mr. Attorney-General. -Oh, my! It's so wonderful to see you.
translation.zh:
‎-总检察长先生
‎-天啊 很高兴见到你

translation.en: [Sims] Folks are able to sort of let their guard down, folks in leadership positions,
translation.zh: ‎那些政要来到这里 都会卸下心防

translation.en: and have real conversations,
out of the limelight.
Out of the eye of the camera.
And trusting that Jesus would... would be present there.
This is impressive.
That's the former attorney-general.
Matthew 11:27.
"No one knows the son except the father.
And no one knows the father except the son, and those to whom the son chooses to reveal himself.
translation.zh:
‎除了子和子所愿意指示的
‎没有人知道父”

translation.en: I didn't have to ask who was in charge, because we talked about him often.
translation.zh:
‎不用问也知道谁是掌权的人
‎因为我们经常提到他

translation.en: It was a guy named Doug Coe.
Know we're going to do everything we possibly can
to be of help to you and your country.
[Luke] He hates the limelight.
It's not about him, it's about Jesus.
I wanted to give you a small gift of our small world.
translation.zh:
‎我希望我们这个小世界
‎能给你一份小礼物

translation.en: [Sharlet] He was introduced to me as sort of like a brother,
translation.zh: ‎他们介绍他时 说他是弟兄

translation.en: but he's like the first brother.
They said said he was a very simple man
translation.zh: ‎他们形容他是个非常简单的人

translation.en: who was closer to Jesus than anybody alive,
translation.zh: ‎他比任何活着的人更亲近耶稣

translation.en: and that if Doug Coe prayed for something, it just happened.
translation.zh: ‎凡事一经他祷告 就会实现

translation.en: They liked very much that nobody outside of the Family knew who Doug Coe was.
translation.zh:
‎他们很高兴除了团契成员以外
‎认识道格科尔的人不多

translation.en: They loved telling stories about how Doug Coe just showed up
translation.zh:
‎道格科尔突然现身
‎总统府或总理府的故事

translation.en: in some president's office or some prime minister's house.
He was clearly a leader to this movement.
translation.zh: ‎他显然是这场宗教运动的领袖

translation.en: And so, you know, "Who is Doug Coe?" is what I really wanted to know at this point.
translation.zh:
‎“道格究竟是谁？”
‎那一刻我真的很想知道

translation.en: [man] You know what I'm concerned about?
The Muslim.
The Muslim has too many babies. We kill too many of ours.
translation.zh:
‎穆斯林生育率太高
‎我们杀死太多婴儿了

translation.en: What is the best way for Christians to win the race against the Muslims?
translation.zh: ‎基督徒要怎么做才能战胜穆斯林？

translation.en: Too many Muslim babies could be a problem.
translation.zh: ‎穆斯林生育率太高固然是个问题

translation.en: But your focus on labels,
Christian and Muslim, gets in the way of your prayers.
translation.zh:
‎你让基督徒和穆斯林
‎阻碍了你亲近耶稣

translation.en: Organized religion distracts from Jesus.
translation.zh: ‎宗教团体只会让我们远离耶稣

translation.en: We've got to take Jesus out of the religious wrapping.
translation.zh: ‎我们必须让耶稣脱离宗教的束缚

translation.en: How do we do that?
It's good to have friends.
Do you know what a difference a friend can make?
translation.zh:
‎你知道一个同伴
‎能带来多大的改变吗？

translation.en: A friend that you can agree with?
Two or three friends agree and pray.
translation.zh: ‎如果两、三个信念相同的人一起祷告

translation.en: They can do anything.
Agreement.
You're a writer.
What's that mean?
Unity.
Agreement means unity.
[Coe] Total unity.
You know, there's another word for that.
A covenant.
-Covenant. -Hmm.
Can you think of anyone who made a covenant... -with his friends? -Jesus.
translation.zh:
‎-谁曾经跟同伴立下誓约？
‎-耶稣

translation.en: Hitler.
Hitler made a covenant.
The Mafia made a covenant.
Look at the strength of their bonds.
translation.zh: ‎你看他们的关系是多么密切

translation.en: It's a powerful thing.
You see, with them, it's honor.
With us, it's Jesus.
Hitler, Stalin,
Mao Tse-tung, Osama bin Laden.
translation.zh: ‎希特勒、斯大林、毛泽东 ‎奥萨马本拉登

translation.en: The Family possesses a weapon those leaders lacked.
translation.zh: ‎团契会拥有这些领袖缺少的武器

translation.en: The "total Jesus" of a brotherhood in Christ.
translation.zh: ‎也就是以耶稣为本的主里弟兄情谊

translation.en: That's what you get with a covenant.
Jesus, plus nothing.
[Sharlet] That phrase, "Jesus plus nothing,"
simultaneously banal and totalitarian...
translation.zh: ‎听起来老套 却充满权柄

translation.en: Well, guys, I gotta go.
...leaves these congressman sitting there
translation.zh: ‎那些国会议员听了怔怔地坐在一旁

translation.en: as if they've been given a revelation.
And it's just like other men have said.
"Doug helped bring me out of religion and into Christ."
translation.zh: ‎“道格带领我走出宗教 亲近耶稣”

translation.en: Doug Coe was a saintly person
who put other people first.
Put a relationship with the Lord first.
And he didn't really want any accolades.
I remember, near the end of my season at Ivanwald,
translation.zh:
‎我记得我即将离开
‎伊凡瓦德之家那段期间

translation.en: I got to help plan a prayer breakfast,
translation.zh:
‎我有幸参与策划一场
‎祷告早餐会

translation.en: and I remember Doug specifically saying,
"Hey, Google me, and let's get any reference down.
translation.zh:
‎“上谷歌搜索我的名字
‎删除所有关于我的资料

translation.en: We just-- I just don't want to be-- I don't want anybody to know,
uh, and to have a sense of I'm sort of this power figure behind this.
translation.zh: ‎认为我在幕后操纵一切的人

translation.en: I just, you know-- This is about the Lord. This is about bringing people together.
translation.zh: ‎我是为了神做事 为了团结大家

translation.en: This is about something much greater than me."
What a wonderfully reassuring thing,
translation.zh: ‎在这个充满权贵和影响力的小镇里

translation.en: in a town that thrives on power and prestige and influence.
So let's be influential, but let's do it quietly.
translation.zh: ‎我们要有影响力 但不要高调

translation.en: Um... So, you know, that was Doug.
Jesus Christ,
when he organizes,
the way he puts the organization together, he makes it invisible.
translation.zh:
‎当祂在创造组织时
‎祂不会在众目睽睽之下

translation.en: When you look at your body,
you don't see your liver and your muscles and your brains hanging out.
translation.zh:
‎我们的肝脏、肌肉和脑袋
‎都不是暴露在外的

translation.en: What he did is he put the finest organization,
translation.zh: ‎祂的做法就是打造最精致的组织

translation.en: and he put a beautiful skin over it.
When you look at the Mafia,
they also use the same type of organization.
translation.zh: ‎他们也采用同样的组织形式

translation.en: Everything visible... [coughs] is transitory.
Everything invisible is permanent and lasts forever.
translation.zh: ‎唯有肉眼看不到的才会持久不变

translation.en: The more you can make your organization invisible, the more influence it'll have.
translation.zh: ‎越难以发觉的组织 影响力越大

translation.en: [Sharlet] I wrote openly in my journal, and less openly as time went on.
translation.zh:
‎起初我会把想法大胆地写在日记本上
‎后来渐渐地保守起来

translation.en: Things that surprised me,
translation.zh: ‎（这是宝血誓约） ‎那些令我震惊的事

translation.en: conversation I heard and questions that emerged.
As time went on, the journal becomes more and more of a detective's journal.
translation.zh:
‎随着时间推移
‎我的日记本也变得越来越像侦探记录

translation.en: I wondered, what do they really mean by "Jesus plus nothing"?
translation.zh:
‎我很想知道他们所谓的
‎“耶稣加零”究竟是什么意思

translation.en: What kind of influence did they want to have in the world?
translation.zh:
‎他们到底想在世界上
‎创造什么影响力？

translation.en: I didn't know then what the ultimate vision was,
translation.zh: ‎我不知道他们最终的愿景是什么

translation.en: but life at Ivanwald seemed to provide some clues.
translation.zh:
‎但生活在伊凡瓦德之家的这段日子
‎让我得以窥见一二

translation.en: One night, there was a social with our sister house,
translation.zh: ‎某个晚上 女生宿舍有一场联谊会

translation.en: young women of this house called Potomac Point.
translation.zh:
‎年轻女性都住在
‎这间叫“波托马克山”的房子里

translation.en: Some of them were really young. Most were sort of in their mid-twenties.
translation.zh:
‎有些姐妹非常年轻
‎多数只有二十多岁

translation.en: There was also a few wives of the senior men around,
who had these sort of den mother kind of roles.
translation.zh: ‎她们在联谊会上扮演女训导的角色

translation.en: [man] Careful, boys.
And they were intense.
[Sharlet] So obviously, there would be no sex.
-Hey. Hello. -Hey!
-Are you going to a wedding? -You wore a tie.
translation.zh:
‎-这是去参加婚礼吗？
‎-你居然系领带？

translation.en: -None of you guys wore ties. -No.
-We didn't. -[brother laughs]
The whole organization is based around this idea of male headship.
-Hello. -Hi.
"As Christ is to the church, so a man is to his family,"
translation.zh:
‎“基督是教会的头
‎如同男人是一家之主”

translation.en: and that there are these levels of hierarchy that must be observed throughout.
translation.zh:
‎因此我们由始至终
‎都必须遵守这种阶级理论

translation.en: [Sharlet] It was the most gender-segregated world I'd ever lived in.
translation.zh: ‎这是我见过性别隔离最严重的圈子

translation.en: Guys, this is Jeff.
-Yeah. Hi. -He's new.
[Sharlet] And the women I got to speak to briefly would tell me
translation.zh: ‎我在跟这些女契友的交谈过程中发现

translation.en: that whereas the young men were being drawn into mentorship
by maybe an influential senior member of the Family, maybe a politician--
translation.zh:
‎导师很可能是团契中
‎德高望重的长辈或政界权威…

translation.en: Maybe you were going to get a junior job in a political office.
translation.zh:
‎或许还有机会在政治办公室
‎谋得一个初级职位

translation.en: But for the women, that wasn't happening for them.
translation.zh: ‎但是这种事都不会发生在女契友身上

translation.en: They were being mentored in service,
and directed toward relationships with men of the Fellowship.
translation.zh: ‎并通过安排跟团契中的男契友交往

translation.en: They said appropriate matches was the goal.
translation.zh: ‎这是为了让她们找到合适的对象

translation.en: Hey, can I ask you something?
-Yeah. -Um...
You ever feel weird, like, serving men?
translation.zh: ‎你对服侍男人这个道理有异议吗？

translation.en: -No. -No?
No. They're so busy loving us, who's loving them?
translation.zh: ‎他们这么爱我们 那谁来爱他们呢？

translation.en: You know, God wants to have a personal relationship with each of us.
translation.zh: ‎神期待与我们每个人建立亲密的关系

translation.en: Jesus is a person.
A real person.
Not some abstract idea.
He wants you to know him.
How can you be so sure?
Don't you have doubts?
That's okay.
Doubt is just a prelude to joy.
[Sharlet] As a brother in Ivanwald, we were chosen.
translation.zh:
‎身为伊凡瓦德之家的弟兄
‎我们都是被神选的人

translation.en: Me, not you.
translation.zh: ‎我是被神选的 而你不是

translation.en: You might be a good person, but you're not a brother.
translation.zh: ‎虽然你是个好人 但你不是我的弟兄

translation.en: -You're not chosen. I am. -I can't breathe!
translation.zh: ‎所以你没被神选 只有我被神选

translation.en: That's what you got. What did you give up?
translation.zh: ‎这就是我们得到的 ‎但我们放弃了什么？

translation.en: You gave up those who were not chosen. Other relationships.
translation.zh:
‎我们放弃了那些未被神选的人
‎我们的私人感情

translation.en: So you had the hierarchy, the concentric rings.
translation.zh:
‎因此在这里 阶层是存在的
‎这个阶层结构是个同心圆

translation.en: At the middle is Jesus.
And next is your cell, your brothers,
translation.zh: ‎圆点外的圈子是小组 也就是弟兄

translation.en: and we are only accountable to one another.
And then after that,
your family, your children, your parents, your partner. After that.
translation.zh: ‎家人、孩子、父母和伴侣排在其后

translation.en: Hitler, Stalin, Mao.
That kind of absolute loyalty, that was the goal.
translation.zh: ‎他们所体现的忠诚 ‎是我们的目标

translation.en: [Coe] I've seen pictures of the young men
translation.zh: ‎我在中国看过几张红卫兵的照片

translation.en: in the Red Guard, 20 years, 20, 22 years old, in China.
A table laid out like a butcher table.
translation.zh: ‎他们前面摆着一张类似屠宰台的桌子

translation.en: They would bring in this young man's mother and father.
translation.zh: ‎接着有人把一个年轻人的父母带进来

translation.en: Lay her on the table, with a basket on the end.
translation.zh:
‎他让母亲平躺在桌上
‎桌尾地上有个篮子

translation.en: He would take an... axe and cut her head off.
translation.zh:
‎那个年轻人抄起斧头一挥
‎母亲人头落地

translation.en: The Viet Cong. Hitler. Mussolini, with the Blackshirts.
translation.zh: ‎越共、希特勒、墨索里尼和黑衫军

translation.en: The one thing in every one of their oaths
is we pledge to be totally unified, even to death.
That was a covenant, a pledge.
translation.zh: ‎那是一个誓约 一个承诺

translation.en: [Sharlet] After I spent many days there,
I had come to feel some affection for the brothers,
and I was feeling more a part of it.
translation.zh: ‎我对这里的归属感越来越深

translation.en: [Sharlet] I had gone not with any plan of how long exactly I was going to stay.
translation.zh:
‎我决定顺其自然
‎不在考虑自己想待多久

translation.en: You know, sort of depending on what I found.
I'd seen all these different, and in some cases outlandish, Jesuses.
translation.zh: ‎我见识过不同的古怪的耶稣门徒

translation.en: But Ivanwald was really the most unusual thing I'd encountered.
translation.zh:
‎但最令我感到不可以思议的
‎依然是我在伊凡瓦德之家的经历

translation.en: And I thought, "Wow, look at these guys, they're always thinking about one another.
translation.zh:
‎我心想：“看看这些人
‎他们为彼此着想

translation.en: There is a kindness here."
And so I wasn't ready to leave.
Then one day, Luke, the man who brought me into it--
translation.zh:
‎直到有一天
‎那个把我带进来的弟兄 也就是卢克

translation.en: His fiance had apparently been sexually assaulted
and of course his first inclination was, "I'm on the next plane. I have to go see her."
translation.zh:
‎他的第一个反应当然是：
‎“我马上搭下一班飞机回去看她”

translation.en: The brothers went, "No. No. We're your brothers.
translation.zh: ‎弟兄们说：“不行 我们是你的弟兄

translation.en: Your loyalty is to us.
And why was she sexually assaulted?
translation.zh: ‎还有 为什么她会被强暴？

translation.en: Where was she that this happened to her?
What was she doing?"
But Luke went anyways,
and they were so contemptuous of that.
They said Luke was a loser.
He chose her rather than...
playing sports with his brothers. That made him a loser.
translation.zh:
‎也不跟弟兄们玩体育
‎因此成了一个失败的人

translation.en: You Jesus before everything else. It seemed so simple.
It's not.
You're doing the right thing.
Hope it works out for you, Jeff. I really do.
translation.zh: ‎杰夫 我真心希望你会成功

translation.en: I know you still have a lot of questions.
translation.zh: ‎我知道你心里还有许多疑问

translation.en: You ask a lot of fucking questions.
Yeah.
This might answer some of them.
translation.zh: ‎这本册子或许可以解答你一些疑问

translation.en: Is there more of this?
Yeah, a lot more.
For an invisible organization, they sure do have a lot of files.
translation.zh:
‎一个无形无相的组织
‎肯定有很多文件记录

translation.en: All right, man.
-I'm out. -Hey.
-Good luck. -Yeah, safe travels.
[Sharlet] So I started reading the history of what I've gotten involved in.
translation.zh:
‎于是我开始研读
‎我加入的这个组织的历史

translation.en: Not just a Christian organization,
translation.zh: ‎原来这个组织不仅是个基督教团体

translation.en: but a fundamentally anti-democratic movement
translation.zh: ‎而是一个原则上反民主的宗教运动

translation.en: at the heart of religious conservatism in the United States for 70 years.
translation.zh:
‎这项运动在美国宗教保守派之间
‎存在70年了

translation.en: "We desire to see a leadership led by God,
translation.zh: ‎“我们渴望看见神领导的领袖

translation.en: leaders of all levels of society..."
And what I discovered was that this organization
translation.zh: ‎我发现虽然这个否认是个组织的组织

translation.en: that denied it was an organization was really one of the greatest networks of powerful figures in the world.
translation.zh:
‎实则拥有世界上
‎规模最庞大的权威领袖网

translation.en: [overlapping, echoing voices] Uganda, Romania, Nigeria...
translation.zh: ‎乌干达、罗马尼亚、尼日利亚等等

translation.en: [Coe] This is the beginning of a worldwide spiritual offensive.
translation.zh: ‎这个全球性属灵武器刚要出现

translation.en: It began with a meeting of 19 business executives...
[Sharlet] Submerge the institutional image.
translation.zh: ‎完全把组织的形象隐藏起来

translation.en: [Coe] No organization, no membership,
-no publicity. -[Sharlet] Jesus infiltrating the world.
translation.zh: ‎不用宣传 耶稣正在渗透全世界了

translation.en: [Coe] Only God can know the measure of influence we have had
translation.zh: ‎只有神知道我们的影响力有多深远

translation.en: [Sharlet] Chosen.
...the man who will commit himself...
...a challenge to be a true...
-We desire to see a leadership led by God. -[Sharlet] Chosen.
translation.zh:
‎-我们渴望看见神领导的领袖
‎-被神选的

translation.en: [Coe] Leaders of all levels of society...
-[overlapping] ...led by God. -Chosen...
translation.zh: ‎在神的带领下 被神选的

translation.en: True disciples...
[Coe] Much has been accomplished. Brothers committed to Christ...
translation.zh:
‎-许多事已经完成了
‎-弟兄必须完全信靠基督

translation.en: Much more must be accomplished.
The enemy is still at large.
